## IMetricsManager.getSvgMetrics() method

Gets the width and height of the workspace's parent SVG element in pixel coordinates. This area includes the toolbox and the visible workspace area.  The width and height of the workspace's parent SVG element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSvgMetrics(): Size;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Size
